home.appDescription: Work your routes while staying organized : the convenient climbing app !

search.starter: Start typing a key word to find routes, locations and competitions.
search.notFoundHelp: Try to search with other keywords.
search.placeholder: Search for a route, a location, a competition...

routes.notesPlaceholder: Notes to add about the route
routes.progressionNotesPlaceholder: Notes to add about this progression
routes.deleteConfirmation: If you delete this route, all your registered progressions on it will be lost. Think about it !
routes.noRoutes: Any route for the moment. Let's add one !

locations.assetsTip: Pro-tip: you'll be able to add pictures to your location after its creation.
locations.notesPlaceholder: Notes to add about this location
locations.noLocations: Any location for the moment. Create one to add your routes.
locations.deleteConfirmation: If you delete this location, routes saved on it will be deleted as well. Therefore, you'll lose your progressions on this location. Think about it !

competitions.noCompetitions: Any competition for the moment. Let's add one !
competitions.deleteConfirmation: If you delete this competition, you'll lose saved statistics. Think about it !

assets.uploadHelper: Upload an asset from your device...
assets.help: An asset is any image that you add to a route, a location... From this menu, you can see all of the assets stored on Highest, and you can delete some of them if you want.

settings.autoDarkThemeDescription: Highest's theme will adjust to your device's one. Make sure your system is up to date so as to take advantage of this feature.
settings.eraseDataConfirmation: If you continue, this action will make you lose all your data, including locations, routes, competitions and settings, definitively. Think about it !
settings.openSource: This project is distributed in open-source under the GNU GPLv3 license.
settings.betaNotice: Please note that the application is in beta : therefore, many bugs exist and some features aren't implemented. If you want to contribute to this projet, head over to the GitHub repository.
